text: tatha unake dilon mein jo dvesh hoga, use ham nikaal denge[1]. un (svargon mein) bahatee naharen hongee tatha ve kahenge ki us allaah kee prashansa hai, jisane hamen isakee raah dikhaee aur yadi allaah hamen maargadarshan na deta, to hamen maargadarshan na milata. hamaare paalanahaar ke rasool saty lekar aaye tatha unhen pukaara jaayega ki is svarg ke adhikaaree tum apane satkarmon ke kaaran hue ho
